attributes.action: keep children in school until 4pm to do their homework
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many parents cant help their kids with homework as they don't know themselves. i think if they did it in school they would have the help and would get it done. the children would learn a lot more by having the extra help. as kids are being put in detention for not doing homework and in a lot of cases the child or parents don't understand how to do it.
